Description:
House-like Space & a Garden to Love!
Wander down this wide hedged drive, step inside this superior single-level home and find house-like space in easy to love gardens! Stretched out across the rear of a well-groomed group of just three, this big-hearted home offers low-maintenance living with a highly accommodating three bedroom floorplan. Offering light-filled garden-focused living/dining plus more room to dine beside the kitchen, this sizeable home is stylishly renovated with stainless-steel appliances and step-in pantry, a separate shower and bath for the fresh bright bathroom plus a private WC. Centrally heated and air-conditioned with robes for every bedroom, this quality home is even sized up and styled up outside....with an oversize garage plus carspace and generous hedged courtyard offering lawns to run, a sandpit to play and a vegie patch to indulge a green thumb. Located in one of the area's leafiest and loveliest streets within a few blocks of station, bus and shops, this sized up single level is one of three with so much to see!
Insights: 3/8 Holloway Street, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2013 and 10 other 3 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Don't Pass This Buy!
All the elements for a great buy or investment opportunity are here! For the home owner, security intercom entry, two undercover basement car parks & a storage cage are rare safety extras which accompany this light-filled & luxurious first floor apartment featuring two double bedrooms (master with ensuite), modern kitchen/family room with stainless-steel appliances & r/c air-conditioning, 2nd bathroom with stone bench tops, Euro laundry & a sunny balcony! Investors too will appreciate this appealing opportunity to secure an in-demand rental, superbly located in the McKinnon Secondary College zone, with Ormond shops and zone 1 station literally minutes away. A good buy for an astute buyer! ..

Description:
Undeniable charm in a sanctuary of calm
Meander along a private drive and discover the immense appeal of this Federation style two bedroom home, beautifully secluded promising perfect peace and privacy in the heart of Ormond. Immaculately presented in soothing, natural hues, it offers tiled entry to inviting lounge, generous open plan kitchen, dining and casual living opening to an elevated Merbau deck and delightful courtyard garden with stunning Jacaranda tree, master bedroom with walk-in and built-in robes plus access to expansive 2 way bathroom, separate laundry and WC. The quality and comfort continues with double glazed windows throughout, ducted heating, split system heating & cooling and a remote garage. Ideally located within the coveted McKinnon Secondary College zone and within walking distance to Ormond's convenient shopping and dining precinct and public transport, this is luxury living in a low maintenance dream!
John Pollard : 0418 331 533

Description:
Zone Deco with land to grow
Open a time-capsule of Art Deco beauty and create a new era of gracious living in the McKinnon College Zone. An impeccable Art Deco example from the grand proportions of bay-windowed living, to a curvaceous eat-in kitchen, to the terrazzo-floored bathroom, this substantial solid-brick home is ready to step out of the past and into the future.
See the beauty in exquisite detail (including a distinctive curved and tiled fireplace, elegant etched glass and lofty deep-corniced ceilings) and work with an easily extended two bedroom floorplan featuring ducted heating, an air-conditioner and French doors to deep potential-filled approx 7790sqft/723sqm gardens.
Highlight the divine Deco detail, extend past the existing brick garage and make the most of an increasingly rare Zone original. Alternatively, see the potential to fill this big backyard with a second home (subject to Council Approval) and reap the rewards of the Zone address with the bus to the bay, Ormond station and Monash University at the door.

Description:
Classic Californian on 664m2 (approx)!
Beyond an unassuming façade lies perfect polish in this McKinnon School zoned Cal. Bungalow. Ornate high ceilings, polished boards, leadlight & open fireplaces feature in an updated floor-plan accommodating four robed bedrooms (ensuite), three handy bathrooms and a recently refurbished gourmet kitchen for the serious cook. Multi-living zones incl. a formal lounge, dining area with ambient gas-log fire & an informal family room which opens to an undercover entertaining deck over enclosed rear gardens. Extras include ducted heating, CaesarStone wet areas, Euro st-st apps., attic ladder & storage, fans, carport & garden shed. Prestigiously located, close to schools, shops & transport. 664m2/7150sqft (approx).

Description:
Charm, comfort & a family focus
Picture-pretty from the outside & equally charming on the inside, this beautifully presented property has a welcoming ambience that makes you feel immediately at home. The flexible floorplan allows for various room configurations & includes L-shaped living room, open-plan Bosch kitchen & family room, master bedroom with ensuite & WIR, family bathroom
& a bonus recreation room/home office (ceiling fan). Enhancing the relaxed low-maintenance lifestyle are polished timber floors, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, an enchanting private garden (with shed) & a location convenient to a range of amenities.
Ruth Roberts : 0409 214 110

Description:
Rest, Nest or Invest!
Looking for low maintenance but struggling to find the space you need? This unit offers a mezzanine floor as an efficient extension of existing space...and includes a visitor's car park in addition to the lock up garage! Nestled to the rear in a quiet street between North Rd shops & station and EE Gunn Reserve, this surprising villa includes evaporative cooling, ducted heating, polished boards & a secure rear courtyard. Three bedrooms (2 with robes) include a master with walk-in robe and wet bathroom, a 2nd family bathroom & a spacious open-plan kitchen/family room with updated appliances (incl. dishwasher) & room for relaxing or meals with friends & family. The perfect downsizer, investment or 1st home! ..

Description:
Earn up to 529,000 Qantas Points*
This stunning apartment has just recently been complete is 1 of just 15 apartments in this exclusive development in the heart of Ormond.
Apartment 11 comprises 2 bedrooms with built-in robes, master with large ensuite, open plan lounge, dining and kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, main bathroom with shower and bath, large entertaining balcony and European laundry.
Features polished floor boards and down lights throughout, split-system air-conditioning, video intercom car space, storage and lift access.
In an ideal and convenient location close to all amenities, the property is just 100m (approx.) from Ormond Station, walking distance to a range of private and public schools, parks within minutes away and about 10 minutes drive to the beach!
There is also substantial retail strip shopping adjacent to the site along North Rd. including an IGA supermarket, eateries, cafes and fresh produce.
Only 2 remaining! Don't miss out on this first class investment opportunity.
Call Christian Numa 0409 141 510 or email Christian.numa@amity.com.au
By purchasing this eligible property through Amity Property Group, an accredited real estate agent of LK Property Group, you could earn one Qantas Point per dollar paid on the deposit and the balance of the purchase price*. That means buying this property for $529,000, could earn you 529,000 Qantas Points^! To find out more, visit www.lkproperty.com.au
*Terms and conditions apply
*You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn points. Membership and the earning and redemption of points are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program available at qantas.com/terms. Members who purchase an eligible property from an accredited agent of LK Property Group, will earn 1 Qantas Point per dollar paid to the vendor or its representative in respect of the deposit and balance of the purchase price only. No points will be earned on any government taxes and charges paid, including stamp duty. The Property must be purchased through a real estate agent accredited by LK Property Group. A list of accredited agents is available at www.lkproperty.com.au. You must provide your Qantas Frequent Flyer membership number to the accredited agent prior to the payment of the deposit. Points will be allocated to the nominated Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) in two stages. Stage 1: upon the contract becoming unconditional and full deposit being paid. Stage 2: upon settlement of the Property and the balance of the purchase price being paid. Points will be credited to the Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) within 6 weeks after payment has been received under each qualifying stage.
^Points value is based on the purchase of the maximum selling price of a property at 11/494 North Road, Ormond, Vic 3162, being $529,000 and is subject to availability

Description:
Shop & dwelling: investment gold!
Invest for success in this well located shop & dwelling in the heart of Ormond Village, on the bus route, near the train station, & with excellent passing trade. Along with the shop - which is securely leased 5 + 5years (commenced 1/9/08, current rental of $15,468 pa) by a strong tenant - comes a vacant (previously let @ $21,900 pa), freshly renovated, double-storey dwelling that includes 3 bedrooms, living room (OFP, A/C), separate modern kitchen, upstairs covered balcony, & polished timber floors. The well maintained building sits on land approx 225sqm, with roller door access from a rear right-of-way. In conjunction with APPS P/L.
Ruth Roberts : 0409 214 110

Description:
This one ticks all the boxes!
A recent refurbishment has added extra sparkle and chic to this extra-large elevated apartment. All the work has been done, immediately rent out or move in and enjoy the restful lifestyle! Accessed from the entrance hallway the easy floor plan comprises of living room opening to balcony, renovated kitchen with gas cooking, excellent sized bedroom (BIR), laundry facilities in the bathroom, separate toilet and a carport. This harmonious home is on the upper level of a neat 2 story block and accessed from Walsh Street, and is desirably located within easy distance to North Road shops, public transport, reserves, leisure facilities and Monash University (Caulfield).
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
Period Perfection in Blue-Chip Ormond!
Originally a builder's own home, this flawless 1930s period property is offered for the first time in over 30 years! Triple fronted & solid brick, authentic Tasmanian hardwood floors, high ceilings, stunning leadlight & open fireplaces create an ambience of old world charm through formal lounge & dining rooms; ornate high or strapped ceilings feature through all three robed bedrooms, whilst casual family living includes an updated central kitchen with granite bench-tops & a large family room leading out to decking, private rear gardens & LUG. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm & a newly updated porcelain-tiled bathroom integrate touches of modern luxury in this superb location-close to shops, station, parks & Ormond Primary or in-zone McKinnon Secondary College. Land size 558m2/6,000sqft (approx)

Description:
Period, Position And Potential!
Stop searching! This semi detached could be the perfect buy, well located close to schools, shops & zone 1 station. Featuring stunning high ornate ceilings, picture rails & polished boards, this well maintained period property offers a temperate haven in summer or winter with its solid brick construction and divided (& heated) living, dining & kitchen areas separated by sliding doors to assist a breeze or contain the heat. Two carpeted bedrooms, vintage bathroom, lock up garage, 2nd toilet & a versatile rear bungalow offer the potential for a future makeover...or extend into the generous rear gardens offered by this 563m2 (approx) block. Whatever your vision, this is a solid semi with pure potential!..

Description:
Picture Perfect Family Living
This magnificent two storey Period Style family home combines todays modern living with the appeal of years gone by. Waitaiki is securely set behind the automated fence with intercom. Upon arrival the classic terrazzo portico invites you in to the traditional foyer with the polished hardwood floors and stained timber paneling. The formal living and dining rooms have strapped plaster ceilings, leadlight windows and feature Inglenook fireplace. The kitchen is modern and well equipped with stone bench tops and glass splash back overlooking the family room which flows onto the large covered entertaining patio. The master bedroom with ensuite, built in robes, powder room and laundry complete the downstairs. Upstairs has 3 double bedrooms with built in robes and family bathroom. Other features include double garage currently converted to home office and multi purpose rumpus. Only moments from great schools, transport and Chadstone Shopping Centre. This home offers the lot.
Kelly Evagora : 0415 323 507

Description:
Earn up to 535,000 Qantas Points*
This stunning apartment has just recently been complete is 1 of just 15 apartments in this exclusive development in the heart of Ormond.
Apartment 1 comprises 2 bedrooms with built-in robes, master with large ensuite, open plan lounge, dining and kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, main bathroom with shower and bath, large entertaining balcony and European laundry.
Features polished floor boards and down lights throughout, split-system air-conditioning, video intercom car space, storage and lift access.
In an ideal and convenient location close to all amenities, the property is just 100m (approx.) from Ormond Station, walking distance to a range of private and public schools, parks within minutes away and about 10 minutes drive to the beach!
There is also substantial retail strip shopping adjacent to the site along North Rd. including an IGA supermarket, eateries, cafes and fresh produce.
Only 3 remaining! Don't miss out on this first class investment opportunity.
Call Christian Numa 0409 141 510 or email Christian.numa@amity.com.au
By purchasing this eligible property through Amity Property Group, an accredited real estate agent of LK Property Group, you could earn one Qantas Point per dollar paid on the deposit and the balance of the purchase price*. That means buying this property for $535,000, could earn you 535,000 Qantas Points^! To find out more, visit www.lkproperty.com.au
*Terms and conditions apply
*You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn points. Membership and the earning and redemption of points are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program available at qantas.com/terms. Members who purchase an eligible property from an accredited agent of LK Property Group, will earn 1 Qantas Point per dollar paid to the vendor or its representative in respect of the deposit and balance of the purchase price only. No points will be earned on any government taxes and charges paid, including stamp duty. The Property must be purchased through a real estate agent accredited by LK Property Group. A list of accredited agents is available at www.lkproperty.com.au. You must provide your Qantas Frequent Flyer membership number to the accredited agent prior to the payment of the deposit. Points will be allocated to the nominated Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) in two stages. Stage 1: upon the contract becoming unconditional and full deposit being paid. Stage 2: upon settlement of the Property and the balance of the purchase price being paid. Points will be credited to the Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) within 6 weeks after payment has been received under each qualifying stage.
^Points value is based on the purchase of the maximum selling price of a property at 1/494 North Road, Ormond, Vic 3162, being $535,000 and is subject to availability.

Description:
Investor's joy: owner-occupiers delight
Enter this first-floor apartment & be immediately struck by the spacious feel, the orderly appearance, & the gleaming parquetry flooring. There's a comfortable living room (with panel heater) off the entrance hall. The separate easy-to-work-in kitchen (with space for washing machine or dishwasher) has a breakfast bar. The main bedroom (with BIRs) has a treetop outlook; bedroom 2 also has BIRs. Best of all, the apartment is serenely set in a location within walking distance to Ormond Village shops, amenities & public transport, & is also convenient to Monash Uni (Caulfield). NB: accessed from Walsh St
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
Tuck yourself into this cosy nest in the Zone
Warm and cosy this 2 bedroom unit is a little gem and ready to shine. One of five and tucked away to the rear ensuring peace and quiet, the charm of this home is evident the minute you step through the door. The L-shaped living/dining/kitchen makes entertaining a breeze, there's carpet throughout, both bedrooms have BIRs and the light filled bathroom, laundry and toilet are all separate. Outside the security door, enough garden to keep a green thumb happy, a single auto garage, and a courtyard full of potential. Close to local shops, parkland, and just metres to the bus.

That magical mix of sunshine, style and seclusion
A recent transformation brings flair and functionality to this beguiling unit tucked peacefully at the rear of a boutique block in this highly regarded, central Ormond location with shops, transport and Monash University just moments away. Opened up to achieve a sense of light and space, its fresh interior in pleasing neutral tones offers polished floors throughout living and kitchen with dishwasher, European laundry, sparkling bathroom with shower over bath, robes to both bedrooms and split system heating and cooling, plus modern extras including quality window furnishings and downlights.
A private, landscaped courtyard and covered car space complete this dream retreat.

Description:
Earn up to 499,000 Qantas Points*
This stunning apartment has just recently been complete is 1 of just 15 apartments in this exclusive development in the heart of Ormond.
Apartment 8 comprises 2 bedrooms with built-in robes, master with large ensuite, open plan lounge, dining and kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, main bathroom with shower and bath, large entertaining balcony and European laundry.
Features polished floor boards and downlights throughout, split-system air-conditioning, video intercom car space, storage and lift access.
In an ideal and convenient location close to all amenities, the property is just 100m (approx.) from Ormond Station, walking distance to a range of private and public schools, parks within minutes away and about 10 minutes drive to the beach!
There is also substantial retail strip shopping adjacent to the site along North Rd. including an IGA supermarket, eateries, cafes and fresh produce.
Only 3 remaining! Don't miss out on this first class investment opportunity.
Call Christian Numa 0409 141 510 or email Christian.numa@amity.com.au
By purchasing this eligible property through Amity Property Group, an accredited real estate agent of LK Property Group, you could earn one Qantas Point per dollar paid on the deposit and the balance of the purchase price*. That means buying this property for $499,000, could earn you 499,000 Qantas Points^! To find out more, visit www.lkproperty.com.au
*Terms and conditions
*You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn points. Membership and the earning and redemption of points is subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program available at qantas.com/terms. Members who purchase an eligible property from an accredited agent of LK Property Group, will earn 1 Qantas Point per dollar paid to the vendor or its representative in respect of the deposit and balance of the purchase price only. No points will be earned on any government taxes and charges paid, including stamp duty. The Property must be purchased through a real estate agent accredited by LK Property Group. A list of accredited agents is available at www.lkproperty.com.au. You must provide your Qantas Frequent Flyer membership number to the accredited agent prior to the payment of the deposit. Points will be allocated to the nominated Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) in two stages. Stage 1: upon the contract becoming unconditional and full deposit being paid. Stage 2: upon settlement of the Property and the balance of the purchase price being paid. Points will be credited to the Qantas Frequent Flyer account(s) within 6 weeks after payment has been received under each qualifying stage.
^Points value is based on the purchase of the maximum selling price of a property at 8/494 North Road, Ormond, being $499,000 and is subject to availability

Description:
Open the gate to Zone rewards
Put yourself at the gate of the College and reap the rewards of elegant easy living with the ultimate College Zone address. Corner-sited at the back gate to the College, this charming late-period home puts the focus on inside-out entertaining lifestyle.
Step inside to find gracious separate lounge and dining rooms, then step out through French doors to a wide veranda and an umbrella-shaded BBQ area in creatively landscaped approx 432sqm gardens. Classically styled with a timeless solid timber kitchen with slick stainless-steel appliances, this enchanting two bedroom home is graced with lofty ceilings, pretty picture-rails, glossy timber floors and warm original woodwork including an impressive cabinetry-flanked fireplace.
Appointed with modern comforts including ducted heating and cooling and generous off-street parking behind auto-gates, this College Zoned beauty is more than just in the Zone ...there's the North Rd bus at the end of the street and Ormond shops and station within a walk too! Start, invest or empty nest .open the gates to College Zone rewards!

Description:
In-Zone Period Perfection!
A magical mix of period perfection & modern amenity. Moments to cafes, station & in-zone McKinnon Secondary College, respectfully extended & updated, this classic Californian boasts high ornate ceilings, lavish leadlight & polished boards, four robed bedrooms (master with fitted walk in robe & ensuite), two fabulous fully tiled bathrooms (bath & seamless shower), flawless formal lounge, powder room, and an open plan Euro-applianced kitchen/family room opening out via dual sided timber bi-folds to undercover decking...further extending the living space & giving a fashionable focus to charming landscaped gardens. Heated & cooled, with carport, storage room & water tanks (water irrigation drip system throughout garden -this is long-term lifestyle living on 695sqm/7480sqft (approx)!..

Description:
A ripper opportunity for nesters or investors
Freshly painted & well presented, this 1st floor apartment has an airy, spacious vibe & is desirably orientated to the north. The open-plan living room - with leafy outlook, recessed shelving, timber venetians, & parquetry floor - includes a compact, timber kitchen designed for functionality. Among the extras - mirror-fronted fitted BIRs; intercom entry; carport; & communal laundry (1 on each level of the well maintained block). With Ormond Village & public transport nearby, as well as handy access to Caulfield Uni, recreation & reserves.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790
